itunes:title: Punched In The Face At TJ Maxx
title: Punched In The Face At TJ Maxx
itunes:author: Joe Vulpis & Ilya Feddy
itunes:summary:
Masks are not required and some tea goes down at TJ Maxx, a bee breaks into the bathroom, spike ball tears us apart, the furniture guy thinks we're not good enough for each other, and the apple store sees nudes on our phone.


Follow us on instagram @lightweightspod to win the giveaway and get featured on our podcast!!
